getFolderPathForWSCall

public static java.lang.String getFolderPathForWSCall(java.lang.String webURL,
                                                      java.lang.String docPath)
While specifying the folder level scope we have to remove the preceding parent site name. e.g, site/list/folder should be converted to list/folder

Parameters:
webURL - The parent Web URL
docPath - docPath as returned by the Web Service
